price: Our command is but a single word[20], which is fulfilled in the blink of an eye.
arabic: وَمَآ أَمۡرُنَآ إِلَّا وَٰحِدَةٞ كَلَمۡحِۭ بِٱلۡبَصَرِ
footnotes: [20] Our command when We want something, We only say, "Be," and it is.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com
